GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the requested article by ID

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing comments for the requested article ID, sorted by newest to oldest
